thread.title: BlackBerry announces major mobile software licensing agreement with Optiemus in India
thread.title_full: BlackBerry announces major mobile software licensing agreement with Optiemus in India

author: Bla1ze
title: BlackBerry announces major mobile software licensing agreement with Optiemus in India
text:
Following several rumors and speculation, BlackBerry have now officially announced an exclusive, long-term licensing agreement with leading Indian telecom enterprise, Optiemus Infracom Ltd to bring the production of secure BlackBerry Android devices.

Following several rumors and speculation, BlackBerry have now officially announced an exclusive, long-term licensing agreement with leading Indian telecom enterprise, Optiemus Infracom Ltd to bring the production of secure BlackBerry Android handsets in more global markets including India, Sri Lanka, Nepal and Bangladesh. This agreement with Optiemus comes shortly after announcing similar deals with TCL Communication and PT BlackBerry Merah Putih .
Read More Â»
